title: Rogan Hosts Vaccine Skeptic Dr. Robert Malone Who Claims "Mass Formation Psychosis"
summary: Dr. Robert Malone on Rogan's podcast falsely claims vaccines increase COVID risk and compares pandemic response to Nazi Germany through "mass formation psychosis" theory, reaching 11 million listeners

sources.title: 270 doctors demand Spotify take action over Joe Rogan vaccine misinformation
Joe Rogan's Malone interview breaks the internet

notes: Malone claimed he invented mRNA vaccines (false). Said vaccines make COVID worse. Compared US to Nazi Germany. 270 doctors wrote open letter. Neil Young, Joni Mitchell pulled music from Spotify in protest.
